column1: Little Goat Diner////I love the Little Goat! The bakery side has cozy seating. They have the best biscuits and cortado in the city--almond milk--yes! Breakfast Tasty Thing is my favorite way to have eggs. Also: Peter and Ryan are two of the most professional and friendly bartenders you will meet in this city. No matter how busy
column2: they are always attentive and aware of what your next request may be. Highly recommended.
